'''v0.11.0 alpha build 9''' is the ninth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|v0.11.0]].

== Fixes ==
'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15320 9 bugs fixed]'''

* Fixed various language errors
* Fixed crash related to tessellator
* Fixed crash related to falling sand
* Fixed crash on the skin selection screen
* Fixed speed modifiers
* Fixed initial spawn teleport bug
* Fixed tamed wolves <!-- (10.5 to Build 9, not from other beta builds) -->

'''From released versions before 0.11.0'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8245}} - You do not catch on fire from mobs which are on fire.

'''From the 0.11.0 development versions'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8283}} - Player is not being pushed by water</onlyinclude>
